div.p: Maximum clade credibility tree of Haemoproteus cyt‐ b (477 bp) lineages recovered from western Himalayan birds in India. Posterior clade probability support values above 0.5 are shown. 27 Haemoproteus lineages found in western Himalayan birds are in red text, and 46 reference Haemoproteus lineages from MalAvi database (Bensch et al., 2009) are in black text
